content: Hi all, when I am trying to create a profile using claim resource, an error is displayed as in the screen shot below. clinfhirclaim.PNG The logical model is also not getting saved. Can anyone please suggest a solution? Thanks in advance
Hi Pranitha - the profile generation is a bit munted at the moment as I'm updating it. Sorry about that - hope to have it updated in a week or so & will post here when done...
@David Hay Ok thank you. Please do update when it is done.
